definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Ssangyong meeting, deep breathing virgin pulp.
Welcome to the Cairo International Conference Center.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎参观开罗国际会议中心。

sentences.english: The representative office of CLNG is located at Ming Wah International Convention Centre in Nanshan, Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 代表处设立在深圳市南山区明华国际会议中心。

sentences.english: By chance, an ancient computer led Tarter to SETI.
sentences.chinese: 因缘际会下，一部古老的电脑引领塔特进入SETI。

sentences.english: Do you know where the Internatonal Convention Center is?
sentences.chinese: 你知道国际会议中心在哪儿吗？

sentences.english: No one falls in love by choice, it is by CHANCE.
sentences.chinese: 没有人因为抉择而落入爱的漩涡，那是因缘际会。

sentences.english: Familiar with International Accounting Knowledge and could do the English Leger & transaction.
sentences.chinese: 熟悉国际会计知识并能够处理英文的分类帐目。

sentences.english: The city is fully open and merchants gathering.

definition: to pursue deer/fig. to vie for supremacy
chance/opportunity/predestined relationship/(Buddhist) principal and secondary causes/chain of cause and effect
the situation (e.g. political)/the state of the world
to meet by chance/to run into sb/chance encounter
to conform with destiny/as the occasion demands
coming together and separating/aggregation and dissipation
